Хорошая и очень популярная игра которая может как расслабить так и заставить попотеть)

Only thing that would solidify this game is the official ridding of toxicity and hackers.... which, unfortunately, will likely never happen. Despite that, still one of the best games I have ever played and I have been playing since 1.6. Takes skills - focus, reaction, pinpoint precision, strategy, intelligence, collaboration, and leadership. Skills that can develop the more you exercise them. Overall, it's the perfect combination of fun and competitive, and with friends to play with, it's hours of good time to be had.
